entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:30 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:47 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: NNW 51 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
